original.text:
Claude now connects to your world on mobile.

With your permission, Claude can find nearby spots, check your calendar, and schedule eventsâ€”all without leaving the app.

media.alt: A smartphone screen displays a chat interface with Claude, featuring a beige background and text conversations. The screen shows a series of messages, including "Help me find time for lunch with Conor near the joint, I mean, from about a good burger spot?" and Claude\'s responses suggesting times and locations. A map pin marks "Near San Mateo, CA" on the screen, and text lists top burger spots like In-N-Out Burger and Gott\'s Roadside. Additional messages show Claude creating a calendar event and drafting an invitation for Conor, with a red star icon next to Claude\'s name.

replies.text: Finally!! Claude is becoming more and more the everything agent!
Yes Claude I would give you access to anything no matter how technically secure it was
